mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.articleno AS "articleno", a.name AS "name", a.brandname AS "brandname", a.marketprice AS "marketprice", a.changediscount AS "changediscount", a.discount AS "discount", a.state AS "state", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO a_dlyb_product_log( id, articleno, name, brandname, marketprice, changediscount, discount, state, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{articleno}, #{name}, #{brandname}, #{marketprice}, #{changediscount}, #{discount}, #{state}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE a_dlyb_product_log SET articleno = #{articleno}, name = #{name}, brandname = #{brandname}, marketprice = #{marketprice}, changediscount = #{changediscount}, discount = #{discount}, state = #{state}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM a_dlyb_product_log where articleno = #{articleno} and create_date <#{createDate}
